attributes.action: to move H.M government to provide a posthumous pardon to Steve Thoburn Metric Martyr
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the EU commission has dropped its attempt to force metric measurements upon our consumers. The government must provide a posthumous pardon to Steve Thoburn who was prosecuted and convicted as a result of a petty and vindictive vendetta brought against him for his insistance on providing his greengrocers goods in imperial measurements to his customers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
